casename: Management Corporation Strata Title Plan No 1938 v Goodview Properties Pte Ltd another
counsel: Woo Bih Li SC and Rodney Keong (Bih Li & Lee) for the plaintiffs; Philip Jeyaretnam and Paul Wong (Helen Yeo & Partners) for the defendants
tags-parsed: Land/Strata titles/Management corporation/Defects in common property not affecting all subsidiary lots/Representative action by management corporation on behalf of affected subsidiary proprietors/Not all individual purchasers were subsidiary proprietors/Whether need to establish substantive cause of action against developers/Whether management corporation can rely on agreements between purchasers and developers and sue in contract/Ambit of s 116(1) of the Land Titles (Strata) Act (Cap 158)
Land/Strata titles/Management corporation/Whether management corporation entitled to sue developer in contract in its own right/ss 33(1), 33(2) Land Titles (Strata) Act (Cap 158)
Land/Strata titles/Operation of s 116(1), Land Titles (Strata) Act (Cap 158)
